embeds.title: Deadline
embeds.description:
The deadline has passed. <@{{ticket.freelancer_id}}> please get the order sorted out as soon as possible!

<@{{ticket.customer_id}}>, please speak with the freelancer about the whereabouts of the order. If you are not satisfied with how the freelancer is reacting or not taking the order seriously, please escalate the order to the management, and <@&1227342571945332777> will help you.
